title: Lost around 3-4k IP for no reason nothing bought on account...
body:
I was casually playing trying to level up my account saving for runes like a friend told me then *bam* out of nowhere I play a match after this match I lose around 3-4k IP not sure exact amount but it was a lot. I searched around and could not find an answer that fixed my problem. I check the account purchase history nothing besides the Anivia I bought on 7/30/16. I tried to restart the client, play a game, buy something small as suggested by a rioter in another post but nothing happened. Please help because it took a lot of time to get this amount of IP. 

Please and thank you,
Hi Im Bam

replies.body: It sounds like your IP balance wasn't sync'd after a purchase, and updated later on (usually after a relog).  Looking into your specific issue, it looks like you purchased Signed.  I wasn't able to see anything out of the ordinary here, and hope that helps clear things up!
